workOne.activity: I lead multidisciplinary teams, coordinate web and application projects, participate in defining requirements with stakeholders, and work as a full-stack developer.

projects.description: Starting a company allowed me to lead three strategic projects that strengthened the company's technological identity and value proposition. I coordinated multidisciplinary teams, ensuring quality, alignment with objectives, and significant commercial impact.

axonqbit.description: Website to position the company as an innovative software factory. I defined content, supervised design and development, ensuring a professional image aimed at attracting clients.

axonscopeWeb.description: Page to showcase AxonScope, highlighting its ability to extract data from websites and APIs to compare prices and generate quotes. I led the team to ensure clarity, consistency, and commercial appeal.

axonscopeApp.description: Platform that automates price collection and analysis, generating accurate reports and quotes. I led the design, development, and integration, validating with stakeholders to optimize results. Try it by logging in on the website with the user 'prueba@axonscope.com' and password 'demoPass'.
